_ABCDEFGHIKLMNOPQRSTUVWY

C

cache_expire - attribute of the class mdb_config
Cache expiration - cache files older than this value (in seconds) will be automatically deleted. 
cache_read() - method of the class mdb_base
Read content from cache 
cache_write() - method of the class mdb_base
Writing content to cache 
cachedir - attribute of the class mdb_config
Directory to store the cache files. 
cast() - method of the class imdb
Get the actors 
colors() - method of the class imdb
Get colors 
comment() - method of the class imdb
Get movie main comment (from title page) 
comment_split() - method of the class imdb
Get movie main comment (from title page - split-up variant) 
companyParse() - method of the class imdb
Parse company info 
composer() - method of the class imdb
Obtain the composer(s) ("Original Music by...") 
converttozip - attribute of the class mdb_config
Convert non-zip cache-files to zip (check file permissions! 
country() - method of the class imdb
Get country of production 
covers() - method of the class movieposterdb
Get the cover images 
crazy_credits() - method of the class imdb
Get the Crazy Credits 
creator() - method of the class imdb
Get the creator of a movie (most likely for seasons only)
